name: Crazy Bocha
description:
Crazy Bocha

A bocce simulator where the rules are a little messed up. This game simulates simple bocce matches and makes them funnier  by adding features like buffs and other stuff, besides the weird crowd that will always be cheering  and smiling whenever you get a great score :)

Please, after playing answer those questions to help me know about your experience:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeqJD_I6ugSm9MZlST7iwHgx-ESHYP8XJVGbLex...
